title: Did Betsy Devos 19 say "only" kill 0.02 percent of US students?
subtitle: On the basis of the claim, which spread widely among teachers and parents in the United States, this means that 14,740 children and adolescents will die.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: In July 2020, US Minister of Education Betsy Davis said "only" 0.2% of the country's K-12 school students - a total of 14,740 children and adolescents - are likely to die from COVID-19 when and if schools are fully opened.
